thread.title: Watch Alia Bhatt Teach Varun Dhawan How to Calculate Compound Interest In The First Trailer Of "Badrinath Ki Dulhania"
thread.title_full: Watch Alia Bhatt Teach Varun Dhawan How to Calculate Compound Interest In The First Trailer Of "Badrinath Ki Dulhania"

title: Watch Alia Bhatt Teach Varun Dhawan How to Calculate Compound Interest In The First Trailer Of "Badrinath Ki Dulhania"
text:
facebook 844 SHARES 
A remix of the iconic â€˜90s mega-hit, Tamma Tamma Loge ? Check! Varun Dhawan and Alia Bhatt's insane on-screen chemistry? Check! A hatke love story? Check! Check. Check! In this very colorful, 3-minute-long trailer for Badrinath Ki Dulhania , you'll see Badrinath Bansal Aka Badri aka Varun Dhawan (who is great at the very crooked, SRK-ish smile), who only believes in marriage (and not love) trying to woo Alia Bhatt. Vaidehi Trivedi a.k.a Miss. Bhatt, the fresh-faced beauty, (who in this role will remind you of Kareena's iconic portrayal of Geet from Jab We Met ), is having none of it. She is determined to teach him all the formulas-whether it's simple interest, compound interest or love. Can't wait for this one! Share this video with friends...
